actions.confirmRemoveAll: You are about to delete all chats. This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
actions.confirmRemoveChat: You are about to delete this chat. This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
actions.confirmRemoveUnstarred: You are about to delete unstarred chats. This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.

guide.desc: Click the button on the left to save the current and start a new conversation.
